classes.name: zui-status
classes.description: The zui-status class identifies an HTML element as a status label. It is recommended that you use this class on a span element.

classes.name: zui-status-blue
classes.description: The zui-status-blue class turns a status label into a blue status.

classes.name: zui-status-brown
classes.description: The zui-status-brown class turns a status label into a brown status.

classes.name: zui-status-green
classes.description: The zui-status-green class turns a status label into a green status.

classes.name: zui-status-red
classes.description: The zui-status-red class turns a status label into a red status.

classes.name: zui-status-subtle
classes.description: The zui-status-subtle class turns a status label into a subtle status. This means that the background color is set to white which draws less attention to the status label.

classes.name: zui-status-yellow
classes.description: The zui-status-yellow class turns a status label into a yellow status.
